participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

participant_2.background: i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel. i have visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i'm 60years old.

content.text: hello. how is your day going?

yes, i am. do you like music?

My  name is the book
